title: Administrative / Personal Assistant Job at Zowdin Limited
content:
Zowdin Limited, a design, construction and real estate development company, is recruiting highly skilled and experienced candidates to join our team in the capacity below:

Job Position: Administrative / Personal Assistant
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Answer phone calls and emails and take messages
	Take accurate and comprehensive notes at meetings
	Help with daily time management
	Run errands as requested
	Make travel arrangements including flights, accommodation and logistics
	Screen and direct phone calls and distribute correspondence
	Handle requests and queries appropriately
	Manage diary and schedule meetings and appointments
	Source office supplies
	Coordinate events and other engagements
	Draft correspondence such as emails and letters
	Act as the point of contact between the director and internal/external clients
	Produce reports, presentations and briefs
	Devise and maintain office filing system
	Other tasks that may be assigned.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a HND / Bachelor's Degree in related fields with work experience
	Proven work experience as a personal assistant
	Strong interpersonal skills
	Tech-savvy and experience with word processing and email programs
	Active listening and good communication skills
	Proactive approach to problem-solving
	Strong time-management and organizational skills
	Knowledge of office management systems and procedures
	MS Office and English proficiency
	Up-to-date with the latest office gadgets and applications
	Ability to multitask and prioritize daily workload
	Excellent verbal and written communications skills
	Ethical and trustworthy, with the ability to handle sensitive information with discretion and confidentiality.
	Results-oriented mindset with a passion for developing to become better.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send theirCV and a cover letter explaining their relevant experience and why they are the best fit for this position to: zowdin.ltd@gmail.com using "Administrative / Personal Assistant" as the subject of the email.

Note: The ideal candidate must reside in Abuja.

title: Architect / 3D Visualizer Job at Zowdin Limited
content:
Zowdin Limited, a design, construction and real estate development company, is recruiting highly skilled and experienced candidates to join our team in the capacity below:

Job Position: Architect / 3D Visualizer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking to hire a creative Architect / 3D visualizer who can create architectural designs for various projects and bring the architectural drawings to life through photo-realistic 3D images, animations and other illustrations of proposed interior and exterior spaces. 
	Our ideal candidate should be able to conceptualize, design and implement timeless, beautiful, and functional spaces.


Responsibilities


	Develop concept plans and design solutions from an understanding of project objectives.
	Create mood boards and colour schemes to illustrate concepts, ideas and proposals.
	Produce detailed architectural working drawings and specifications.
	Be capable of modelling projects from minimum sketches and coordinate independently with other professionals and third parties when required.
	Creating 3D models from architectural plans, rough sketches, or real-life objects using special rendering software.
	Outline project requirements and cost for completion of project.
	Supervise site activities to ensure all specifications are met.
	Create an extremely photorealistic interior, landscape visuals, and animation using 3Dmax/V-Ray/Lumion, Corona Renderer.
	Create 3D walkthrough & fly-through animation.
	Outline the timeline for the completion of projects.
	Work efficiently with design team, contractors, and other members of the team.
	Regularly follow trends in real estate, architecture, and interior design so that own work and ideas are of an international caliber and level of sophistication, and in order to incorporate the latest technology and operational needs.


Requirements


	A Degree qualification in Architecture, Interior Design, Interior Architecture, or a related field of study. Masters degree in any of this fields is a plus.
	At least 4 years of proven experience in Architecture Design
	Member of ARCON and NIA is an added advantage
	Must be proficient in the use of design software like AutoCAD, Revit, Sketch Up, ArchiCAD, Adobe Illustrator + Photoshop, Rendering + Visualization (3Dmax/V-Ray/Lumion, Corona Renderer), or similar to create detailed design layouts and 3D presentations.
	Proven experience as an interior designer and or furniture designer is an added advantage
	Expert knowledge of building products, construction details and relevant rules, regulations, and quality standards.
	A very good understanding of space planning and design to generate the best value for projects.
	Ability to travel when required
	Must have good communication and presentation skills.
	Working knowledge of financial and budgetary management.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: zowdin.ltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only CVs with Architectural Portfolios will be considered    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Junior Web Developer Job at GN128 Limited
Social Media and Content Creator Job at Home Bargains Nigeria Limited
content:
Home Bargains Nigeria Limited is a gift and decor store situated in Abuja, Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media and Content Creator

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
Working Schedule: Four times a week

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	In this role, you will create engaging content to showcase our unique gift products and enhance our brand presence.
	You'll be responsible for producing content for social media and promotional materials that connect with customers.
	If you’re passionate about gifts and content creation, we’d love to have you on board!


Responsibilities


	Create engaging video contentfor social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, etc.) that showcases products, store promotions, and seasonal offerings.
	Produce high-quality product videos, including unboxings, demonstrations, tutorials, and customer testimonials, to highlight the unique features of gift items.
	Design promotional videos and adsto support sales campaigns, new arrivals, and special events, ensuring videos are aligned with the brand’s aesthetic and goals.
	Collaborate with the marketing teamto develop content strategies that increase online visibility and drive traffic to the store.
	Edit and optimize videosfor each platform, ensuring content is tailored to platform-specific formats and engagement trends.
	Create attention-grabbing video contentthat showcases store events, product launches, or exclusive offers to entice customers.
	Design eye-catching promotional materials(such as banners, flyers, and social media posts) to support video content and store promotions.
	Monitor performance of video contentacross platforms, analyzing metrics to improve future content and drive higher sales conversions.
	Keep up with trendsin video marketing and social media to continuously evolve content and stay relevant to the target audience
	More tasks as may be required.


Requirements


	Minimum of HND qualification
	3 years of experience.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover letter to: ad.homebargains@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Warehouse Coordinator Job at Future Moves Recruitment (FMR) Agency
content:
Future Moves Recruitment (FMR) Agency is a licensed full-fledged Human Resource firm with extensive expertise and experience in human Capital development and staffing. Future Moves has exceptional expertise in Talent Sourcing, learning & development, talent management, HR Outsourcing & Payrolling, HR planning & Consulting, Policy Drafting, Culture Change and Organisation Effectiveness by designing and implementing interventions which identify the core areas of development to enhance the overall growth and competitiveness of your organization.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Coordinator
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Satellite Town, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-Time
Industry: Pharmaceutical
Reports to: Warehouse Manager

Job Summary


	The Warehouse Coordinator oversees the day-to-day operations of the warehouse, ensuring accurate inventory management, timely order fulfillment, and adherence to safety standards. This role supports efficient receiving, storing, and dispatching of goods.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate and monitor daily warehouse activities including receiving, storing, and dispatching of goods.
	Supervise warehouse staff and assign tasks to ensure smooth workflow.
	Maintain accurate records of inventory and ensure proper documentation.
	Conduct regular inventory counts and reconcile discrepancies.
	Liaise with suppliers, logistics companies, and internal departments as needed.
	Ensure timely and correct fulfillment of orders and deliveries.
	Monitor warehouse equipment and report maintenance or repair needs.
	Implement and enforce safety and cleanliness standards within the warehouse.
	Assist in the development and improvement of warehouse procedures and policies.
	Prepare reports on warehouse performance, stock levels, and operations.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or related field.
	Proven experience in warehouse operations or logistics coordination.
	Strong organizational and leadership skills.
	Proficiency in inventory management software and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to multitask and work under pressure.
	Knowledge of warehouse health and safety standards.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruiter.j@fmragency.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
